(I see...so two 'grenades' hurt the shields, but five missiles didn't really 
do that much?  Ok...anyway, about the Oblitercons, they are a very close 
team.  They take an attack on one of their team members as on attack on 
themselves)


The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark 
Claw/Unitron/Sixshot/Shockwave/Serpentor:




Dark One activated his comm. unit.  "Oblitercons, I'm running low on 
missiles.  Try to not use energy weapons.  I wish to attempt to form 
Oblitertron again later."  Dark One fired of a pair of missiles as he 
received acknowledgements from the rest of his team.

---

Breakdown let out a loud grunt as the missile exploded against his left 
pectoral, the explosion tearing apart much of his armor, his face cut from 
the exploding metal.  "Hey, you too!" he  yelled as he fired a grenade off at 
Shokaract.

---

Pyro fired off three fire balls at Serge.

---

Hiss fired off three fusion blasts from his cannon at Shokaract.

---

Scavenger fired off another 25 explosive rounds at the Mafia Base.  He lifted 
up his left arm, firing off another rocket from his bazooka at the Mafia Base.

---

Demon Wulf lifted his sword, another blade missile launching out at the 
shields.

---

Flesh Ripper fired another blast of flames from his mouth at the base.

---

Dark Claw brought his hands together, slowly pulling them apart until they 
were three feet apart.  He threw the blue sizzling orb at the Mafia Base 
(same strength as two of the smaller orbs)

---

Unitron dived, firing two more missiles at the Mafia Base, pulling up 
quickly, a few autogun blasts scraping against the underbelly of his jet 
fighter mode.

---

Serpentor did a flip to the left, the explosions from the missiles almost 
tipping him over.

He didn't see the two missiles that struck him in the side, sending him 
twelve feet to the side, slamming down to the ground.

---

Sixshot changed his course heading straight for the purple space fighter that 
had opened fire on Serpentor.  He fired off ten rapid blasts of laser energy.

---

Shockwave rolled to the left, avoiding the laser fire.  He returned fire with 
two missiles.  The large explosives flew through the air, heading for Sixshot.
